title: Weather & climate - precipitation
creator_credit: Ian Rosenbloom, European Broadcasting Union and Yorkshire Television
brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “Planet Earth”.
Program 3 of a 4 part series. Each program is divided into sections for easy classroom viewing using a combination of the latest computer graphics, and filmed examples of climatic occurrences to provide a detailed description and explanation of the geographical factors influencing Planet Earth. This video aims to provide a detailed description and explanation of water in various forms: types of rainfall; prevailing winds; anticyclones; tropical storms and predicting the weather. Includes a teacher’s guide.
creator_credit_for_label: Ian Rosenbloom, European Broadcasting Union and Yorkshire Television
